name: 1-Person CPR
description: Standard CPR performed by one rescuer
warning: Only perform CPR if the person is unresponsive and not breathing. Call 911 immediately before starting.
emergency_notes: Continue CPR until emergency services arrive
Perform 30 compressions followed by 2 rescue breaths
Do not stop compressions for more than 10 seconds

steps.title: Check Responsiveness
steps.description: Tap the person's shoulders and shout 'Are you okay?'
detailed_instructions: Look for any response or movement
steps.voice_prompt: Check if the person responds. Tap their shoulders and ask if they're okay.

steps.title: Call 911
detailed_instructions: Call 911 yourself or have someone else call
Put phone on speaker if possible
steps.voice_prompt: Call nine one one immediately before starting CPR.

steps.title: Position Hands
steps.description: Place hands on center of chest
detailed_instructions: Place heel of one hand on center of chest
steps.voice_prompt: Place the heel of one hand on the center of the chest. Put your other hand on top and interlock your fingers.

steps.title: Start Compressions
detailed_instructions: Push straight down at least 2 inches deep
steps.voice_prompt: Start chest compressions. Push hard and fast, at least 2 inches deep. Perform 30 compressions.

steps.title: Give 2 Rescue Breaths
steps.description: Tilt head back, pinch nose, give 2 breaths
detailed_instructions: Tilt head back to open airway
steps.voice_prompt: Give 2 rescue breaths. Tilt head back, pinch nose, and blow into mouth for 1 second each.

steps.title: Continue CPR Cycle
steps.description: Repeat 30 compressions, 2 breaths until help arrives
steps.voice_prompt: Continue the CPR cycle. Thirty compressions, then two breaths. Repeat until help arrives.
steps.critical_warning: Continue until paramedics arrive or person shows signs of life
